remarks: The symbol at a given index of a cyclically shifted nonempty word is the symbol at the shifted index of the original word.  (Contributed by AV, 13-May-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 21-May-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2018.)
statement: cshwidxmod $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ I e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( W cyclShift N ) ` I ) = ( W ` ( ( I + N ) mod ( # ` W ) ) ) ) $.
